TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableCellCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableCellCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableCellCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableCellCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件的一个行中的单元格。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the cells in a single row of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以编程方式管理对象的集合, 这些对象表示控件中单个行的单元格。 Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the cells of a single row in an control. 此类通常用于添加、移除或修改控件的行中的单元格的内容。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a cell in a row of an control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含一个 属性 , 该属性包含对象的集合。 An control contains a property that contains a collection of objects. 每个对象都表示表中的单个行。Each object represents an individual row in the table. 对象包含一个表示对象集合的属性。 An object contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象又表示行的单个单元格。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of a row. 若要检索单个单元格, 请首先获取表示表中包含该单元格的行的对象 ( 来自控件的集合)。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object that represents the row containing the cell in the table (from the collection of the control). 然后, 可以 从对象的集合中获取代表行中的单元格的对象。You can then get the object that represents the cell in the row (from the collection of the object). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过向 集合添加单元格来动态生成控件的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding cells to an collection. 请注意, 由对象表示的行的属性是集合。Notice that the property of a row, represented by an object, is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象追加到 集合的结尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可将指定的对象添加到集合的末尾。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 如果要在集合中的指定位置插入对象, 请使用方法。If you want to insert an object in a specified location in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将由对象表示的表的单元格追加到集合的末尾。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a cell of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 请注意, 由对象表示的行的属性是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从 集合中移除所有 对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可从集合中移除所有对象, 并将属性重`0`置为。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将删除行中的单元, 但不会从表中删除该行。This method removes the cells from a row, but it does not remove the row from the table. 若要从表中删除行, 请确保同时从 控件的集合中移除表示该行的对象。To remove a row from the table, be sure to also remove the object that represents the row from the collection of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法从集合中移除所有项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然后, 新项将添加到集合并显示在控件中。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/CS/htmltablecellcollectionclearcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/VB/htmltablecellcollectionclearvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the items from the collection to the specified , beginning with the specified index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以从数组的指定索引处开始, 将集合的内容复制到指定的中。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified , starting at the specified index of the array. > [!NOTE] > 参数必须是从零开始的。 `array`The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建一个包含与集合相同的内容的数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 然后循环访问该数组, 以显示集合的内容。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
The number of objects in the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定集合中包含的单元格数。 Use the property to determine the number of cells contained in the collection. 此属性通常在循环访问集合以确定上限时使用。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定控件行中的单元格的数目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of cells in a row of the control. 然后, 将此值用作循环的上限, 以循环访问表中某行的单元格。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the cells of a row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/VB/htmltablecellcollectioncountvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A -implemented object that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个实现了的对象, 该对象可循环访问以检索集合中每个项的内容。Use this method to create a -implemented object that can be iterated through to retrieve the contents of each item in the collection. 使用属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法可将枚举数移至初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 在创建实现的对象之后或使用方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项之后, 必须调用方法。 The method must be called after creating the -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则, 由属性表示的项是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建实现了的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a -implemented object. 然后循环访问该对象以显示集合的内容。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此索引器获取 集合中的对象。Use this indexer to get an object from the collection. 您可以使用简单数组表示法访问指定索引处的对象。You can access an object at a specified index by using simple array notation. > [!NOTE] > 集合从零开始;因此, 该集合中的第一个元素包含的`0`索引值。The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器 从集合中检索由对象表示的表的单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a cell of a table, represented by an object, from the collection. 然后, 将用新内容更新该单元。The cell is then updated with new content. 请注意, 由对象表示的行的属性是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从集合中的指定索引处移除对象。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from an collection. 索引号从零开始;因此, 该集合中的第一项的索引值为`0`。The index number is zero-based; therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的索引超出了索引值范围, 则会引发异常。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法从集合中移除位于指定索引处的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 此示例从控件的第一列中删除单元格。This example removes the cells from the first column of the control.
